caption: What can I say about Trienta y Tres that hasn’t been said at this point? Anyone who’s anyone has been and even though I was amongst the first to score a reservation... it’s almost impossible for me to get a table anymore. The beverage program is out of this world, the starters are divine, the steak was perfect (I hear they have the beef flown in daily from New Zealand!), and the deserts almost killed me. Phenomenal front of house too, the whole crew said they’d just started after years at Jean Georges. Wow! Bright future for Trienta y Tres.

What an amazing first post-Covid dinner! The service was stellar and oh so gracious. Appetizer was divine, and entree was best steak I’ve had in years.  The chef was not grumpy - ignore the other reviews. Very interested to see what this chef does next!!!!
i 100% reccomend going to treinta y tres! the food was delicious and the creme brulee was the best creme brulee ive ever had
The creamiest mash potatoes I've ever tasted! I will definitely be going back to Treinta y Tres the food is delicious and the waiter Pablo is very nice and talkative.

I 100% recommend Treinta y Tres. This newly opened restaurant fills all your cravings with a main course of steak or lobster and a side of mashed potatoes. Although the menu is limited, that's what makes it all the more easy to choose your meal. After you've inhaled your lobster blinis, you are kindly served with a soft crème brûlée, completed with a rich custard base and the crunch of a satisfying caramel layer. I do recommend leaving a tip though, or a waitress with long hair will assign you a 500 word essay. That's all!! I hope you take Treinta y Tres into consideration for your very important meal.
The steak was amazing, best I have ever had! Chef seems a bit grumpy though.
The steak was very good and was cooked perfectly. Pablo the waiter was very playful and I will definitely go back again.
this restaurant was wonderful the food is wonderful. the wait was worth it. the food was delicious.
Chef Ambrose makes an amazing lobster dish and the best creme brûlée I’ve ever had. The waiter Pablo seemed a little jumpy.
We had a great meal here. The creme brûlée is delightful. Chef seems a bit grumpy.
